pull_request.title: Simplify command-line parsing of gztopic echo output

pullrequest.title: Simplify command-line parsing of gztopic echo output

content.raw: I think that's a great idea; it will just require adding argument handling to gztopic, which isn't a bad thing. I'll copy the approach from gzlog when I have a chance. '-u, --unformatted' sounds good.
content.html: I think that's a great idea; it will just require adding argument handling to gztopic, which isn't a bad thing. I'll copy the approach from gzlog when I have a chance. '-u, --unformatted' sounds good.

pull_request.title: Simplify command-line parsing of gztopic echo output

pullrequest.title: Simplify command-line parsing of gztopic echo output

content.raw: What do you think about changing `echo2` to be a command line flag, such as '-u, --unformatted'. This flag could then be used across multiple commands. For example, the 'list' command could output a space separated list **(I'm not encouraging you to add in this functionality).
content.html: What do you think about changing echo2 to be a command line flag, such as '-u, --unformatted'. This flag could then be used across multiple commands. For example, the 'list' command could output a space separated list **(I'm not encouraging you to add in this functionality).
